user_stories.title: User Registration via Email
user_stories.user_story: As a new user, I want to register using my email address so that I can create an account and access the platform.
acceptance_criteria: User can input email, password, and confirm password fields.
System validates the email format.
System checks password strength and matches confirmation.
User receives a verification email upon registration.
User cannot register with an already used email.

user_stories.title: User Login
user_stories.user_story: As a registered user, I want to log in with my email and password so that I can access my account securely.
acceptance_criteria: User can input email and password.
System validates credentials against stored dATF.
User receives error message for incorrect credentials.
System prevents login after 5 failed attempts.
User is redirected to dashboard upon successful login.

user_stories.title: Password Reset
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to reset my password if I forget it so that I can regain access to my account.
acceptance_criteria: User can request a password reset link via email.
System sends a secure reset link to the user's email.
User can set a new password using the reset link.
System enforces password strength requirements.
User receives confirmation after successful password reset.

user_stories.title: Profile Management
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to view and update my profile information so that my account details are accurate.
acceptance_criteria: User can view current profile information.
User can edit and save changes to profile fields.
System validates updated information before saving.
User receives confirmation after successful update.
Changes are reflected immediately on the profile page.

user_stories.title: Upload Profile Picture
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to upload a profile picture so that my account is personalized.
acceptance_criteria: User can select and upload an image file.
System validates image format and size.
Profile picture is displayed on the user's profile.
User can remove or replace the profile picture.
System provides error messages for invalid uploads.

user_stories.title: Dashboard Access
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to access a personalized dashboard so that I can see relevant information at a glance.
acceptance_criteria: User is redirected to dashboard after login.
Dashboard displays user-specific dATF.
User can navigate to other sections from the dashboard.
Dashboard updates dynamically based on user activity.
User sees notifications and alerts on the dashboard.

user_stories.title: Search Functionality
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to search for items using keywords so that I can quickly find what I need.
acceptance_criteria: User can input search keywords.
System returns relevant results based on keywords.
Results are displayed in a paginated format.
User receives feedback if no results are found.
Search is case-insensitive and supports partial matches.

user_stories.title: Filter Search Results
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to filter search results by categories so that I can narrow down my options.
acceptance_criteria: User can select one or more filter categories.
System updates results based on selected filters.
Filters are clearly displayed and can be reset.
User can combine multiple filters.
Filtered results load without page refresh.

user_stories.title: View Item Details
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to view detailed information about an item so that I can make informed decisions.
acceptance_criteria: User can click on an item to view its details.
Item details page displays all relevant information.
User can see images, descriptions, and specifications.
User can navigate back to the search results.
System displays related items on the details page.

user_stories.title: Add Item to Favorites
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to add items to my favorites list so that I can easily access them later.
acceptance_criteria: User can mark an item as favorite from the details page.
System adds the item to the user's favorites list.
User can view and manage their favorites list.
User can remove items from favorites.
Favorites persist across sessions.

user_stories.title: Notifications for Updates
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to receive notifications about important updates so that I stay informed.
acceptance_criteria: User receives notifications for relevant events.
Notifications are displayed on the dashboard.
User can mark notifications as read.
System stores notification history.
User can enable or disable notifications.

user_stories.title: Admin: Manage Users
user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to view, edit, and deactivate user accounts so that I can maintain platform integrity.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can view a list of all users.
Admin can edit user details.
Admin can deactivate or reactivate user accounts.
System logs all admin actions.
Deactivated users cannot log in.

user_stories.title: Admin: Manage Items
user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to add, edit, and remove items so that the platform content stays up to date.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can add new items with all required fields.
Admin can edit existing item details.
Admin can remove items from the platform.
System validates item dATF before saving.
Changes are reflected immediately to users.

user_stories.title: Admin: View Analytics
user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to view analytics on user activity and item popularity so that I can make informed decisions.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can access analytics dashboard.
Dashboard displays user activity metrics.
Dashboard shows item popularity statistics.
Admin can filter analytics by date range.
Analytics dATF updates in real time.

user_stories.title: User: Contact Support
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to contact support through a form so that I can get help with issues.
acceptance_criteria: User can access the support contact form.
User can submit queries with subject and description.
System sends confirmation of submission.
Support team receives the query for follow-up.
User can view status of submitted queries.

user_stories.title: User: Change Password
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to change my password from my account settings so that I can keep my account secure.
acceptance_criteria: User can access password change option in settings.
System validates current password before allowing change.
New password must meet strength requirements.
User receives confirmation after successful change.
User is logged out from other sessions after password change.

user_stories.title: User: Delete Account
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to delete my account so that my dATF is removed from the platform.
acceptance_criteria: User can request account deletion from settings.
System asks for confirmation before deletion.
All user dATF is permanently removed upon deletion.
User receives email confirmation of account deletion.
User cannot log in after account is deleted.

user_stories.title: User: Multi-device Access
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to access my account from multiple devices so that I can use the platform anywhere.
acceptance_criteria: User can log in from different devices.
User dATF syncs across devices in real time.
Favorites and settings are consistent on all devices.
System logs device access history.
User can log out remotely from any device.

user_stories.title: User: Receive Email Alerts
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to receive email alerts for important activities so that I am always updated.
acceptance_criteria: User receives email alerts for account changes.
User receives alerts for new items or updates.
User can manage email alert preferences.
System sends emails in a timely manner.
User can unsubscribe from email alerts.

user_stories.title: User: Accessibility Features
user_stories.user_story: As a user with accessibility needs, I want the platform to support screen readers and keyboard navigation so that I can use it comfortably.
acceptance_criteria: Platform supports standard screen readers.
All interactive elements are accessible via keyboard.
Images have descriptive alt text.
Contrast ratios meet accessibility guidelines.
User can adjust font sizes for readability.

summary: 20 comprehensive user stories have been generated covering all major functional requirements, including user account management, dashboard, search and filter, item details, favorites, notifications, admin features, support, security, multi-device access, email alerts, and accessibility.
